2405.17116.title: Mixtures of Unsupervised Lexicon Classification
2405.17116.paper_summary:
This paper presents a mixture version of the method-of-moment unsupervised
lexicon classification by an incorporation of a Dirichlet process.
2405.17116.paper_summary_zh: 本文提出了一個方法矩無監督詞彙分類的混合版本，並結合了狄利克雷過程。
2405.17116.author: Peratham Wiriyathammabhum et.al.
